Field Goal Percentage:

$FG\% = \frac{FG}{FGA}$

Effective Field Goal Percentage:

$eFG\% = \frac{FG + (0.5 \cdot 3P)}{FGA}$

True Shooting Percentage:

$TS\% = \frac{PTS}{2(FGA + (0.44 \cdot FTA))}$
